Main.Intro: Select the e-collection(s) that you wish to update.
Main.NoRecords: This app allows you to quickly update e-collections. Please navigate to a list of e-collections.

Form.Intro: For each field you wish to update, select the action (clear, replace, etc.) and the value of the field.
Form.FailureMessage: E-Collection ID {id} could not be updated: {message}

Results.Success: {num} {num, plural, one{e-collection was} other{e-collections were}} updated successfully.
Results.Failure: {num} {num, plural, one{e-collection} other{e-collections}} could not be updated.
